name: azure-nodejs
description: Azure Functions sample for the Serverless framework

scripts.deploy: npm run compile && date +'%nvar BUILD_TIME = "%c"' | tee -a updateAddresses/handler.js && chamber exec azure/test1 -- npx serverless deploy
scripts.run:local: npm run compile && RUN_CONSOLE=1 chamber exec azure/test1 -- node updateAddresses/handler
scripts.start: languageWorkers__node__arguments="--inspect=5858" chamber exec azure/test1 -- func host start
